infoSection.subtitle: Welcome to IRENIC HOTEL
infoSection.heading: Unique Comfort in Konyaaltı
infoSection.text: An unforgettable holiday experience awaits you at our luxury hotel on Antalya Konyaaltı Beach! This unique location within walking distance to the sea offers the perfect opportunity for the most enjoyable vacation of your life.

Rooms.heroDescription: Located in the heart of Antalya’s Konyaaltı district, Irenic Hotel offers a refined selection of stylish rooms designed for both business and leisure travelers. Whether you choose a deluxe room, a cozy corner space, or our exclusive Jacuzzi suite, you’ll enjoy comfort, modern amenities, and effortless city access.
